body_html:
Thats great . Unfortunately i cannot get my GPU to run that fast :)

I reinstalled anaconda3 and have set the variables:

export CUDNN_LIB_DIR=/home/USERNAME/cuda60/lib64
export CUDNN_INCLUDE_DIR=/home/USERNAME/cuda60/include
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/home/USERNAME/cuda60/lib64:/home/USERNAME/cuda60
/include:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
export CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=/home/USERNAME/anaconda3

I compile pytorch following the instructions in the readme except that i build with

python setup.py build_deps && python setup.py develop

When i build the correct cudnn is found

-- Building with NumPy bindings
-- Detected cuDNN at /home/sorson/cuda60/lib64, /home/sorson/cuda60/include
-- Detected CUDA at /usr/local/cuda

I cudnn5 is in /usr/local/cuda/include and /usr/local/cuda/lib64 i dont know if that is a problem? and why would pytorch write 6005?

body:
Thats great . Unfortunately i cannot get my GPU to run that fast :)

I reinstalled anaconda3 and have set the variables:

```
export CUDNN_LIB_DIR=/home/USERNAME/cuda60/lib64
export CUDNN_INCLUDE_DIR=/home/USERNAME/cuda60/include
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/home/USERNAME/cuda60/lib64:/home/USERNAME/cuda60
/include:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
export CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=/home/USERNAME/anaconda3
```

I compile pytorch following the instructions in the readme except that i build with

```
python setup.py build_deps && python setup.py develop
```
When i build the correct cudnn is found

```
-- Building with NumPy bindings
-- Detected cuDNN at /home/sorson/cuda60/lib64, /home/sorson/cuda60/include
-- Detected CUDA at /usr/local/cuda
```

I cudnn5 is in `/usr/local/cuda/include` and `/usr/local/cuda/lib64` i dont know if that is a problem? and why would pytorch write 6005?
